text:
Summarize this dialog:
Steve: Bought the new Dream Theater album 5 minutes ago. I hope it's good.
Rob: I have it here on my desk, ready for the first listening.
Steve: Ok, I'll tell you later what I think about it.
Rob: Same here. See you later!
---
Summary:
Summarize this dialog:
Louis: <file_gif>
Archie: Wtf? Lol!
Louis: <file_gif>
Archie: That one looks like Melanie
Louis: True! Hahahahah
Archie: Just like in this pic
Archie: <file_photo>
Louis: Lol! It's her!
Archie: By the way, she was way hotter when she had cury hair
Louis: I disagree, sir! She looks absolutely gorgeous with straight hair
Archie: Oh well, you have the right to an opinion even if it's wrong XD
---
Summary:
